user.title: GIOŚ (Polish Chief Inspectorate Of Environmental Protection)
user.description: Set up GIOŚ (Polish Chief Inspectorate Of Environmental Protection) air quality integration. If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/gios
